mozilla.components.support.base.observer

Class ObserverRegistry<T>

  • mozilla.components.support.base.observer.ObserverRegistry<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<T>

    public class ObserverRegistry<T>
implements Observable<T>

    A helper for classes that want to get observed. This class keeps track of registered observers and can automatically unregister observers if a LifecycleOwner is provided.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObserverRegistry()
      A helper for classes that want to get observed. This class keeps track of registered observers and can automatically unregister observers if a LifecycleOwner is provided.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(T observer)

        Registers an observer to get notified about changes.

      • register

        public void register(T observer,
                     android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner)

        Registers an observer to get notified about changes.

        The observer will automatically unsubscribe if the lifecycle of the provided LifecycleOwner becomes DESTROYED.

      • register

        public void register(T observer,
                     android.view.View view)

        Registers an observer to get notified about changes.

        The observer will automatically unsubscribe if the provided view gets detached.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(T observer)

        Unregisters an observer.

      • unregisterObservers

        public void unregisterObservers()

        Unregisters all observers.

      • notifyObservers

        Notify all registered observers about a change.

        Returns a list of lambdas wrapping a consuming method of an observer.
